name: Square-Enix Adventures!
description:
Square-Enix Adventure is a quiz-game, with 15 questions, about some of the worst titles in the studio's history. Can you find the real titles and reach the end? Prove to yourself you are the ultimate Square-Enix's fan!

HOW TO PLAY

You just have to choose the correct answer to reach the end. If you choose one of the wrong titles, you'll have to go back to the Main Menu. Have fun!

Logo by David Fialho
